p: The main advantages of cold press extraction techniques are: low equipment cost and energy requirement, high quality and readymade consumable oil, and avoidance of usage of chemicals [ 71]. On the contrary, cold pressing has some drawbacks such as low yield, low content of vitamin, phospholipids, phytosterols, antioxidants and high oil content in the residual cake [ 70]. Seeping of oil-degrading enzymes such as lipoxygenase can degrade the extracted oil. Cold pressing is used to produce a flaxseed meal with a residual oil content ranging from 9% to 15% [ 70].
